sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import ReactHtmlParser from "react-html-parser" import {Table, TdLeft, TdRight, PackDiv, Theader, Tbody, Body, Content, Td, ButtonCart } from '../PackPromoElement' import ShoppingCartOrange from "../../../images/shoppingCartOrange.png" import { useDispatch, connect } from "react-redux" import { addToBasket } from "../../../features/reducers/BasketSlice"; import { addToCart } from "../../../features/actions/cartAction" import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; const Product = (props) => { const { active, cat, index, handleSelection } = props; const dispatch = useDispatch(); const history = useHistory(); const handleAddToBasket = () =>{ dispatch(addToBasket({ idCat: cat.id, nameCat: cat.name, priceCfaProduct: cat.products[0].priceCfa, priceEuroProduct: cat.products[0].priceEuro })) history.push('/panier'); } return ( <> { cat.products.map(item => ( <>
Description :
 {ReactHtmlParser(item.description)}
Prestations :
Contenues
 {ReactHtmlParser(item.contentPrestation)}
Délai en semaines :
 {item.leadTime}
Prix TTC FCFA
 {ReactHtmlParser(item.priceCfa)}
Prix TTC Euros
 {ReactHtmlParser(item.priceEuro)}
)) } ) } export default Product;
